display_long_description:
**GYM CLASS is the top VR sports (basketball, baseball, football) game 🏀🏈⚾** 

Experience NBA licensed team courts, multiplayer games, simulation physics, and massive worlds, parks, & stadiums. Rated **best on Quest** - make friends or level-up to be the best among millions in the top VR sports community. With **weekly updates**, you'll always have something new to try in **Gym Class**.

[media]

**Download FREE to experience:** 
- ➕ Realistic Physics: No game has ever brought this level of realism. Bring any IRL move to basketball, try any dunk, throw different pitch types, & more.
- 🎮 Multiplayer Games: Play games with friends or AI.
- 🌍 Social Worlds: Connect with friends in massive environments.
- 🏈⚾ Multi-Sport: Basketball, baseball, football, & arcade.
- 🎨 Endless Styles: Play to unlock seasonal items - hoodies, shirts, jerseys, suits, glasses, hats, mascots, green effects, & more.

[media]

**NBA Bundle unlocks:**
- 😮 NBA team courts: Hoop on virtual replicas of all 30 NBA team courts in arenas & training facilities.
- 🏆 Apparel & challenges: Two sets of team-branded apparel, a team-branded basketball, & team-branded hat. Play games to unlock additional items.
- 👕 NBA Passes: Get the seasonal pass to unlock premium NBA clothes & accessories - available for purchase separately.

[media]

**GC PRO unlocks:**
- 🏠 Private Lobbies: Custom space & rules. Play privately w/ friends
- 👕 Full-body Avatars: Design your look - face details, hairstyles, body shape, height, tattoos, facial hair...
- 🤖 Custom Bots: Name & design your AI. 

[media]
